column5: Hey gang,  Searching through Google, I couldn't find too many operators for Lake Scugog.  Any recommendations for a 4-6 man hut rental?   Thanks
Only one listed in Ontario Out of Doors:  Paul's Ice Huts, Port Perry 905-985-7166 or 905-243-6475
Try Scugog Ice Adventures, they should be able to hook you up.
Have you tried to PM Greg (user name Slayingm) as he may know a few.  I retnted from Scugog Ice Hut Rentals last year and they were nice folks.  This year I am using my uncles hut...
